body:
Buffers are not included in `module.parameters` and will not be updated by optimizer. So it should be better to raise a warning when registering a `Variable` with `requires_grad=True` to buffers.

`Variable` and `Tensor` are OK for buffer if merged. But the built-in type such as int and float should not be registered into `buffer`, because the `.cuda` method of `nn.Module` will fail.
